abstract: Readers responded with suggestions about what could replace the "Monday Night Football" theme song. One answer stood out.
snippet: Readers responded with suggestions about what could replace the "Monday Night Football" theme song. One answer stood out.
lead_paragraph: All good blog threads must go to die, but here's a Fifth Down final word (we think) on Hank Williams Jr.

headline.main: For 'Monday Night' Introduction, How About the Haka?
